Text:
Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level Middle School. Limit the output to 150 words. Use a formal tone.
Nutrition is the study of how the body uses food to stay healthy. It's like fueling a car, but instead of gasoline, our bodies need food to give us energy and help us grow. Just like cars need the right kind of fuel to run smoothly, our bodies need the right foods to stay healthy. A balanced diet includes a variety of foods like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins. These foods provide essential vitamins and minerals that help our bodies function properly. Eating a healthy diet can help us stay focused in school, feel good, and even prevent diseases. By learning about nutrition, we can make informed choices about what we eat and take care of our bodies. This knowledge can also help us make healthy choices for the rest of our lives. By eating well, we can live a long and healthy life.
